message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. I think this is a fair price considering its worth to you is $800000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to me.
